thread.title: stilter

author: stilter
title: stilter
text:
When I signed up for Banggood some 3 years ago, I was a bit wary of buying so far away from home. I started small to see how things would work.
Without exception all my orders worked out fine and today I order from them with confidence.
Along the years some shipments had trouble arriving, but Banggood's answer to that is a remarkable service team that never lets you down:
- They spend equal attention to every inquiry, no matter its commercial value.
- Questions are answered within the day and the answers are to the point and effective.
- If goods take more time to ship than advertised, they will propose a refund. That has happened well before I could feel my impatience starting.
- Order processing is carefully monitored: if goods take too long time to ship, they spontaneously refund.
- If goods don't arrive, they will organize reshipment, no questions asked. That happened to me once with an untracked shipment.
Typically goods are sent with a working tracking number, I learned from them that most shipments stay longer with customs than they are in transit!
What more could I ask? This is excellent customer service...
And oh, they have also names!
Thank you very much for your great care, Amor, Candice, Chloe, Cherry and Sharon!
